actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Reported to House from the Committee on Armed Services, H. Rept. 94-22.

official_title: Resolution directing the President to provide to the House the information contained in the report of William E. Colby delivered to the President on or about December 26, 1974, and relating to certain activities of the CIA.

summary.text: Directs the President to provide to the House the information contained in the report of William E. Colby delivered to the President on or about December 26, 1974, relating to activities of the Central Intelligence Agency.

titles.title: Resolution directing the President to provide to the House the information contained in the report of William E. Colby delivered to the President on or about December 26, 1974, and relating to certain activities of the CIA.
